responses: You should be like me! Sharp as a dagger! Faster than a hawk. More graceful than- Ah! I tripped. :yum:
I'm a thief! Let me steal away those problems! :heart:
This reminds me of that time I saw the best dagger ever, but some dragon was guarding it...
Don't make me get my knives out!
These daggers are for more than making me look cute. :smiling_imp:
Keep talking like that, and maybe I'll get the mods involved.
Get a gooood deep sleep, that way you can't hear me steal your stuff...
